def_cn: 移植(植物);(使)(植物)适应异地生长环境
def_en: To naturalize a species of plant means to start it growing in an area where it is not usually found. If a plant naturalizes in an area where it was not found before, it starts to grow there naturally.
See also:naturalized; If the government of a country naturalizes someone, they allow a person who was not born in that country to become a citizen of it.
